Furthermore , IL-15 overcome lack CD4 help CTL induction . - IL-15 highly active number syngeneic mouse tumor model also effective augment activity NK-cells CD8+ T-cells rhesus macaque indicate may active human cancer . Eligibility Criteria : - Patients great equal 18 years-old pathologically confirm metastatic malignant melanoma metastatic renal cell cancer . - Patients metastatic renal cell cancer must either refuse treatment , fail tolerate , progressive disease receive sorafenib sunitinib , temsirolimus . - Patients measurable disease . - Absolute granulocyte count ( AGC ) least 1500/mm ( 3 ) platelet count least 75,000/mm ( 3 ) .
